name: Stetho Module
description: A module that injects Facebook's stetho library, a custom Android debug bridge that connects applications to the chrome developer tools on a connected PC to allow for investigating traffic, files and databases.
author: Alexander Fink <alexander.fink@cispa.saarland>, Maximilian Jung <maxjung96@gmx.de>, Oliver Schranz <oliver.schranz@cipsa.saarland>
